title: Halberdier

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Patrol **outside a player's house, seeing how many people visit your target and blocking attackers.
- **Guard **a player's house, preventing all visits to your target.
- **Defend **a player's house, killing all visitors to your target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You grant your target Powerful defense against all direct attacks no matter which ability you use.
- Attackers are not included in the visitor count when patrolling, however you will know how many attackers you block.
- You cannot block players with a priority of 3 or less according to the list in <#978786268597063700>.
- You may target yourself once.
